column1: Dervorin was the son of the Lord of the Ringló Vale.
Dervorin came to Minas Tirith on foot
column2: leading three hundred men to aid in the defense of the City.

column1: 2001-2007: The Lord of the Rings Trading Card Game:
:A Decipher card identifies one of the Gondorians of Minas Tirith in The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King as Devorin.
Category:Characters in The Lord of the Rings
